summary: The speaker advises content creators to focus on building culture around their niche rather than just creating content. They suggest asking what content will impact the culture and take up space in the niche, and to break down broader ideas into specific content formats to ensure success.
transcript: stop creating content start creating culture every founder brand owner CEO whatever it is it's always this what's our content strategy what are we doing the next three months how many times should we post these are all the wrong questions where I always start with a brand is this what are we going to do content wise that is actually going to impact the culture around the niche that we are trying to take up space in so I'm actually going to use my brand here as an example the question I asked myself was how am I going to impact the culture around marketing and consulting I went to comment sections to understand what the culture surrounding my space was at the time nobody in my space was making content that was applicable tangible and not just generic advice so right there I knew I had the ability to impact culture by giving away really strong tangible advice being opinionated about what marketing was good and what people could do better I built my entire brand around this so I'll leave you with the final exercise that you should actually apply to your brand right now to write out everything that you want to change or have an impact on inside your space your niche and then think about how you can make series out of each and under that how you can break those series down into different content formats that is where you start and that is going to make a significant in the success or failure of your brand dmitri out
